original_title: On a Wing and a Prayer: An American Muslim Learns to Fly
overview: This gently funny film follows Monem Salam as he enrolls in an open-minded flying school. Monem is the son of a Pakistani commercial pilot. His wife Iman's family is Palestinian and although initially dubious about the marriage, now accepts the cultural differences. These modern-day Americans cast off stereotypes and refuse to succumb to victimhood.
title: On a Wing and a Prayer: An American Muslim Learns to Fly
